doc.title: Climate Change Cartoon No. 1: Empty Space
doc.plot: EMPTY SPACE tells about what happens if climate change is ignored. It plays with the idea that blue sky and sun all day long pretends everything is still like it was. The apocalyptic scenario described in the text part has its counterpart in the dramatic animation part. Here the scary sound and the theatrical scenery of setting contradicts the threatening evoked by the text part. Will there really be an apocalyptic ending or is our love of horror writing this story with us?
